function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Misinformation spread about the disease","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Psychological burnout and demoralization among health care workers","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges of health and nutrition of low-income households","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive scientific studies on covid-19 impact on human development and well-being","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Weak community-based crisis risk management","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of inter-sectoral collaboration and government agreements for covid-19 control policies","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Trans-disciplinary health science research must be prioritized to develop a universal response to covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Extensive research is needed to understand the covid-19 crisis life cycle and its causes and consequences","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Research studies are needed to explore the interconnection of climate change to the development of the virus and its potential environmental factors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of community participation in disease prevention and management","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient focus on physical distancing and behavioral modification","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-low"},{"name":"Lack of integrated environmental and health management perspective","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of stakeholder engagement in combating covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate access to culturally adaptable and affordable technology","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate consultation of vulnerable populations in planning and response","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uneven distribution of vaccination","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Intellectual property rights and affordability","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inequitable distribution of disease load among vulnerable populations","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of resources and expertise for covid-19 surveillance in low/middle-income countries","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate vaccination coverage and acceptance in local communities","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fragmentation of health services leading to limited timely interventions and responses to health crises","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of highly active surveillance using who-recommended surveillance case definition","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of supported physical distancing interventions leading to high epidemic peaks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of post-crisis reconstruction and recovery","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spontaneous behavioral reactions and rumors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of safety nets for vulnerable populations","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spread of fake news and misinformation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequacies in global governance structure","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerable older persons facing challenges in accessing medical treatments and health care services for non-covid ailments and chronic diseases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Isolation and limited mobility of older people living alone creating greater risks.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased barriers for individuals living with disabilities in accessing mobility, health services, and appropriate communication.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Governance efficiency and quality being put to the test during the pandemic.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Children without access to internet or digital devices for remote learning","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disruption of global education and lack of distance-learning solutions","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Severe impact of socio-economic and financial impacts on vulnerable households","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increasing demand for care of covid-19 patients","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Deepened pre-existing inequalities in access to health services and social protection","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Significant rise in domestic violence","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases due to lack of need-based initiatives and geopolitical cooperation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of pandemic on informal sector workers and migrant workers","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased incidence of suicide among vulnerable populations","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious disease spread due to lockdown-related limitations on economic activities and livelihoods","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health inequalities due to existing social stratification and resource sharing","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in domestic violence cases and mental health issues due to social isolation and lockdowns","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emerging issues related to jobs and income of millions of people, social safety net, future of income support schemes, the burden on women, and the plight of migrants and informal sector workers","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of access to resources and sudden disappearance of informal sectors of employment","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Developmental impacts on health, education, gender, economy, politics, and the environment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate management of health risks, injuries, diseases, disabilities, psychological problems, and deaths in pandemics","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of pandemics on human life and the global economy","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate and inaccurate covid-19 information in literature","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
